predicate.note: Frames file for 'unroll' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, but following 'roll' could be in: build-26.1 coil-9.6 preparing-26.3-1 roll-51.3.1 run-51.3.2 shake-22.3 shake-22.3-2 slide-11.2-2 split-23.2.

example.name: agentive/transitive
example.text: Come daybreak, eight family members and two other workers unroll a sheet of raw rubber that covers the floor of the house and spills out onto the street.
example.arg: eight family members and two other workers
a sheet of raw rubber that covers the floor of the house and spills out onto the street

example.name: inchoative
example.text: Guests bring movies on tape, and show their favorite three-to-five minute segments on the screen that [*T*-1] unrolls from the ceiling of the Volokhs' art-nouveau library (``the pleasure dome'').
example.arg: from the ceiling of the Volokhs' art-nouveau library (``the pleasure dome'')
